strapiPost.title: Arkansas Enduro Series Comes To Fayetteville This Weekend
strapiPost.content:
The Arkansas Enduro Series is coming to Centennial Park in Fayetteville this weekend, and online registration closes today at 8p. 

  • The series: Enduro is a competition, party, spectating event, and family fun with music, food, and beer! The racing combines multiple aspects of mountain bike disciplines and required terrain adaptability. Fayetteville’s event is the third of five events in the series. 
  • The races: Racers in the series earn points during races, and the Series Overall Points will be decided by the best 3 out of five races in each category. There will be “Flavor of Enduro” races on Friday for no series points for people who want a taste, and the series races for points and all skill levels will be on Saturday.

Learn more HERE.
